author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

By moving the header FWLiteAnalyzerWrapper.h to PhysicsTools/FWLite we break the dependency of PhysicsTools/UtilAlgos on PhysicsTools/FWLite. In addition to better dependency management, this will also avoid loading unneeded shared libraries during cmsRun processing.

#### PR validation:

The code compiles.
title: Remove FWLite dependency from PhysicsTools/UtilAlgos
